name: Forget Me Not
description: Remembers everything you see so you don't have to. This module primarily serves to provide data to other modules.

name: Pearly Whites
description: OkCupid doesn't let you view other photos without uploading yours, but really they just throw a sheet over the photos, they're still there. This removes the sheet.

name: People Summary
description: Provides a summary of information about the people that have visited you and those that you favorited

name: Photo Browser
description: Modifies the photo browser to display all photos without scrolling.

name: Recently Visited
description: Provides enhanced functionality for the list of Recently Visited members, including the ability to store and maintain more than just the past 8 visitors.

name: You Might Like
description: Provides additional settings for the You Might Like panel on the home screen.
